title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: In the weeds with Napoleon Bonaparte; the sharp comic fiction of Laurie Colwin; the designer who transformed the modern office; an author’s nightmare from Laura Lippman and more.
body:
The conqueror of Europe was also an ‘intermittent gardener’ to the end. Review by Christoph Irmscher.
Read the review
The barrier between humans and wild animals has a long history, but trust a fox to sneak through. Review by Danny Heitman.
Read the review
Laura Lippman’s psychological thriller turns on an author’s creation who takes on a life of her own. Review by Tom Nolan.
